Electronic Store

This Business setup for Electronics store where they can sell their electronics items like Home Appliances, Kitchen Appliances, etc...

Customers are either visiting the store to discover new products, either exploring the webshop looking for great offers and discounts / cheapest costs,.

They generally require the functionalities of several apps to manage their business workflow.

ELECTRONICS STORE Business Flow Flow 1. Purchase Flow 2. Sale with serial number Flow 3. Delivery Flow 4: Field Service Installation - AC Flow 5: Website Complaint Flow 6: POS Shopping

Business Flow

Flow 1. Purchase

Let's buy some items that are tracked by serial numbers.

  • Create the purchase order
    • Select product LG Dual Inverter Window Air Conditioner
    • Confirm the RFQ
  • Go to the reception
    • Assign serial numbers
    • Validate the Receipt

Flow 2. Sale with serial number

When selling electronics, most items are tracked with serial numbers. To deliver the installation service, we use the project management app, with one task per installation to do.

Create a quotation with:

  • product: LG Dual Inverter Window Air Conditioner
  • product: Air Conditioner Installation
  • payment term: 30 % Advance Rest on Installment
To speed up the creation of the quotation, use a quotation template.

Once the order is confirmed:

  • Odoo will generate 1 task for the Air Conditioner installation.
  • The delivery order will be created for the LG Dual Inverter
    • The salesperson sets the "expected delivery date" based on customer availability

Flow 3. Delivery

Every day, the logistic manager reserves products that should be delivered today (reservation is set to manual for this location, so that he has a control of what he wants to send today). If a delivery order should be delivered today but products are not available, he informs the customer using the chatter on the delivery order.

Then, the worker processes all delivery orders that are ready, using the barcode interface. From delivery orders:

  • Click on the first delivery order
  • Scan product LG Dual Inverter Window Air Conditioner
  • Scan the serial number
  • Click the "validate" barcode

Flow 4: Field Service Installation - AC

In the office, the service manager assigns tasks to installers. To do so

  • Go to project "Air Conditioner Installation"
  • Switch tasks to Gantt view
  • Use the magnifier ðŸ”Ž icon to select tasks to assign

Field service engineer checking daily activity with mobile app:

  • Go to mobile odoo app "Air Conditioner Installation"
  • Check with My Tasks
  • Plan to visit customer location
  • After completion of the work, update the remarks
  • Field service engineer will visit the client place and start working on installation.
  • Document - Guidelines of Installation
  • Product wise guidelines and steps given for the Service Engineer
  • Move the task "In Progress" and then "Done" when it's finished and sign the service report.
  • Worksheet will help for the installation report

Flow 5: Website Complaint

Customer can register their complaint for the existing purchased products with serial numbers from the website:

  • From the website, click on the menu Helpdesk
  • Fill the form:
    • Enter the product LG Dual Inverter Window Air Conditioner
    • Provide the serial number 804KCPY43321
    • Submit the ticket.

Flow 6: POS Shopping

From the POS Shop:

  • Select the customer
  • Add the products to the cart
  • Select any of the payment methods and proceed to the payment.
Use Ship Later option before the checkout for shipping later
